PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-05672015-05-07,  ,  PS,  , 
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Licences Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS in order to continue to maintain favourable conditions for expired Possession Only Licence (POL) holders to bring themselves into compliance so that they may benefit from the POL to Possession and Acquisition Licence conversion provisions of Bill C-42, should it receive Royal Assent and be brought into force.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0104 Publication Date: 2015-05-20
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Firearms Licences Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS in order to continue to maintain favourable conditions for expired Possession Only Licence (POL) holders to bring themselves into compliance so that they may benefit from the POL to Possession and Acquisition Licence conversion provisions of Bill C-42, should it receive Royal Assent and be brought into force.
